review: I was impressed when the first attempt in using it worked like a charm (Facebook).I then went to another page and it would not make the switch.  An error blaming my computer.  I had to get out of the program.  I could not cast after that.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The actual product works well and is easy to setup. But right now there are very few apps that you can use with the Chromecast. I chose the Chromecast because of its universal ability to integrate with Windows and Mac products. But I could have waited for Google to add some more apps that would expand the opportunities to use the Chromecast, since that is almost what it's doing now. Also while attempted to stream a movie via the HBO Go app, I waited 5 mins for the movie to load (and eventually gave up) and bounce over to the television. Now since I was attempting to do this via my iPhone and because I was connected to the Chromecast's network I was not able to use my home WiFi that usually averages 40 mbs, this may have something to do with it with the long loading time.
author: Robert Longfellow

review: Easy to setup, I liked it so much the first day I recommended it to friends (who I then helped set up, actually was easier the second time). Set-up is very straightforward, took one on vacation and was able to watch Netflix in our little vacation villa in the Caribbean. Highly recommended.
